titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Joseph D. Cusick Papers
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Collection primarily relates to his fundraising activities on behalf of Stanford University (as an alum and as a member of the Stanford Associates) and the reunions of the Class of 1951, held between 1976 and 2006. Included are correspondence, reports, manuals, newsletters, publications, clippings, programs, and a few photographs. There are also files pertaining to the Campus Conference (an Alumni Association event), 1960-66, and student disruptions on campus, 1969-73.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Joseph D. Cusick Papers (SC0871). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Joseph D. Cusick earned his AB at Stanford in 1951; he did post graduate work in law at the University of San Francisco and received his MBA from the University of Santa Clara. In addition to his career as an Air Force civilian executive, he has served in a number of fundraising campaigns for Stanford University.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection primarily relates to his fundraising activities on behalf of Stanford University (as an alum and as a member of the Stanford Associates) and the reunions of the Class of 1951, held between 1976 and 2006. Included are correspondence, reports, manuals, newsletters, publications, clippings, programs, and a few photographs. There are also files pertaining to the Campus Conference (an Alumni Association event), 1960-66, and student disruptions on campus, 1969-73.

note.p: One oversized panorama photograph of the Class of 1951 at their 40th Reunion was removed and added to the Stanford Historical Photograph Collection under the number GP 16457.
